title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

The response must accurately describe the data.

For Task A, the response must identify the issue that the greatest percentage of Democrats believe should be a top priority in 2019

For Task B, the response must correctly describe a difference in the types of issues that Democrats and Republicans believe should be a top priority.

For Task C, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about why the parties differ on the issues shown on the chart.

For Task D, the response must correctly explain how the information in the chart could be used by candidates running for office.

The point for each criterion is earned independently.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
